built_date.description: The built date of the component
built_date.title: Built Date

cpe.description: The Common Platform Enumeration of the component
cpe.title: Common Platform Enumeration

download_location.description: The download location of the component
download_location.title: Download Location

external_references.description: The external references of the component
external_references.title: External References

mime_type.description: The MIME type of the component
mime_type.title: MIME Type

omniborId.description: The OmniBOR Artifact ID of the component
omniborId.title: OmniBOR Artifact ID

purl.description: The package URL of the component
purl.title: Package URL

releaseNotes.description: The release notes of the component
releaseNotes.title: Release Notes

release_date.description: The release date of the component
release_date.title: Release Date

source_info.description: The source information of the component
source_info.title: Source Information

source_repo.description: The source repository of the component
source_repo.title: Source Repository

swhid.description: The Software Heritage persistent ID of the component
swhid.title: Software Heritage Persistent ID

swid.description: The Software Identification Tag of the component
swid.title: Software Identification Tag

valid_until_date.description: The valid until date of the component
valid_until_date.title: Valid Until Date

verificationCodeExcludedFiles.description: The excluded files of the verification code
verificationCodeExcludedFiles.title: Files that were excluded when calculating the verification code

isLive.description: Indicate a URL is still a live accessible location on the public internet
isLive.title: Is Live

isValid.description: True if the URL is a valid well formed URL
isValid.title: Is Valid

isWayBackLink.description: True if the License SeeAlso URL points to a Wayback archive
isWayBackLink.title: Is Wayback Link

match.description: Status of a License List SeeAlso URL reference if it refers to a website that matches the license text.
match.title: Match

order.description: The ordinal order of this element within a list
order.title: Order

url.description: URL(or URN) of the external reference
url.title: URL

alg.description: The algorithm used to compute the hash
alg.title: Algorithm

phone.description: The phone number of the individual
phone.title: Phone

crossRefs.description: Cross Reference Detail for a license SeeAlso URL
crossRefs.title: Cross References

licensing.description: The licensing information of the license
licensing.title: Licensing

spdxID.description: The SPDX identifier of the license
spdxID.title: SPDX ID

altIds.description: License identifiers that may be used to manage licenses and their lifecycle
altIds.title: Alternate License Identifiers

expiration.description: The timestamp indicating when the current license expires (if applicable).
expiration.title: Expiration

lastRenewal.description: The timestamp indicating when the license was last renewed. For new purchases, this is often the purchase or acquisition date. For non-perpetual licenses or subscriptions, this is the timestamp of when the license was last renewed.
lastRenewal.title: Last Renewal

licenseTypes.description: The type of license(s) that was granted to the licensee.
licenseTypes.title: License Type

licensee.description: The individual or organization for which a license was granted to
licensee.title: Licensee

licensor.description: The individual or organization that grants a license to another individual or organization
licensor.title: Licensor

purchaseOrder.description: The purchase order identifier the purchaser sent to a supplier or vendor to authorize a purchase
purchaseOrder.title: Purchase Order

purchaser.description: The individual or organization that purchased the license
purchaser.title: Purchaser

locale.description: The ISO-639 (or higher) language code and optional ISO-3166 (or higher) country code. Examples include: "en", "en-US", "fr" and "fr-CA"
locale.title: Locale

sourceID.description: The source ID of the relationship
sourceID.title: Source ID

targetID.description: The target ID of the relationship
targetID.title: Target ID

aliases.description: The other names of the release.
aliases.title: Aliases

featuredImage.description: The URL of the featured image for the release note.
featuredImage.title: Featured Image

notes.description: Notes containing the locale and content.
notes.title: Notes

resolves.description: The issues resolved by the release.
resolves.title: Resolves

socialImage.description: The URL of the social image for the release note.
socialImage.title: Social Image

title.description: The title of the release note.
title.title: Title

type.description: The software versioning type the release note describes.
type.title: Type

ID.description: An optional identifier which can be used to reference the service elsewhere in the BOM. Every bom-ref MUST be unique within the BOM.
ID.title: BOM Reference

authenticated.description: A boolean value indicating if the service requires authentication. A value of true indicates the service requires authentication prior to use. A value of false indicates the service does not require authentication.
authenticated.title: Authentication Required

data.description: Specifies information about the data including the directional flow of data and the data classification.
data.title: Data

description.description: Specifies a description for the service
description.title: Service Description

endpoints.description: The endpoint URIs of the service. Multiple endpoints are allowed.
endpoints.title: Endpoints

externalReferences.description: External references provide a way to document systems, sites, and information that may be relevant but are not included with the BOM. They may also establish specific relationships within or external to the BOM.
externalReferences.title: External References

group.description: The grouping name, namespace, or identifier. This will often be a shortened, single name of the company or project that produced the service or domain name. Whitespace and special characters should be avoided.
group.title: Service Group

name.description: The name of the service. This will often be a shortened, single name of the service.
name.title: Service Name

properties.description: Provides the ability to document properties in a name-value store.
properties.title: Properties

provider.description: The organization that provides the service.
provider.title: Provider

services.description: A list of services included or deployed behind the parent service. This is not a dependency tree. It provides a way to specify a hierarchical representation of service assemblies.
services.title: Services

tags.description: Provides a way to categorize or classify services. Tags are free-form and can be used to group services in a way that is meaningful to the organization.
tags.title: Tags

trustZone.description: The name of the trust zone the service resides in.
trustZone.title: Trust Zone

x-trust-boundary.description: A boolean value indicating if use of the service crosses a trust zone or boundary. A value of true indicates that by using the service, a trust boundary is crossed. A value of false indicates that by using the service, a trust boundary is not crossed.
x-trust-boundary.title: Crosses Trust Boundary

algorithm.description: The algorithm used to generate the signature.
algorithm.title: Algorithm

certificatePath.description: Optional. Sorted array of X.509 [RFC5280] certificates, where the first element must contain the signature certificate. The certificate path must be contiguous but is not required to be complete.
certificatePath.title: Certificate path

excludes.description: Optional. Array holding the names of one or more application level properties that must be excluded from the signature process. Note that the "excludes" property itself, must also be excluded from the signature process. Since both the "excludes" property and the associated data it points to are unsigned, a conforming JSF implementation must provide options for specifying which properties to accept.
excludes.title: Excludes

keyId.description: Optional. Application specific string identifying the signature key.
keyId.title: Key ID

value.description: The signature data. Note that the binary representation must follow the JWA [RFC7518] specifications.
value.title: Signature

lineNumber.description: line number offset in the file
lineNumber.title: Line Number

fromFile.description: File from which the snippet is extracted
fromFile.title: From File

tagID.description: The tag ID of the SWID
tagID.title: Tag ID

tagVersion.description: The tag version of the SWID
tagVersion.title: Tag Version

text.description: Describe the metadata and content of the SWID
text.title: Text

url.description: The URL of the SWID File
url.title: URL

contentType.description: The content type of the text
contentType.title: Content-Type

external_references.description: The external references of the document
external_references.title: External References

license_list_version.description: The version of the license list
license_list_version.title: License List Version
